markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bloodletting Fangs](/Feats.aspx?ID=5722) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=750" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 43 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
fangs unarmed attack

</column>

---

You emulate your vampiric parent's techniques for drawing blood from a victim. Your fangs Strikes deal an additional 1d4 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) on a critical hit.
name: Bloodletting Fangs
